trans-unit.source: Creates a new verb to be used with the designer using the associated verb group, text and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo verbo que se va a utilizar con el diseñador utilizando el grupo de verbos asociado, texto y controlador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> describes an action to take against a workflow component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> describe una acción que se va a emprender con respecto a un componente de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> options are displayed in the menu bar and right-click context menus during design time.
trans-unit.target: Las opciones <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> se muestran en los menús contextuales de clic con el botón secundario y en la barra de menús durante el tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> will be grouped with other verbs associated with the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> and are displayed in the corresponding sub-menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> estará agrupado con otros verbos asociados al mismo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> y se mostrará en tiempo de diseño en el submenú correspondiente.

trans-unit.source: The event handler passed when creating a new verb will be invoked when this verb is chosen from the menu.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de eventos pasado al crear un nuevo verbo se invocará cuando este verbo sea elegido en el menú.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to associate with the new verb.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que debe asociarse al nuevo verbo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> in which the new verb belongs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> al que el nuevo verbo pertenece.

trans-unit.source: The description of the verb to show on the menu.
trans-unit.target: La descripción del verbo para mostrar en el menú.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> that will handle the menu selection event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> que controlará el evento de selección del menú.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> by using an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> value, a description of the verb, and an <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> utilizando <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, un valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" />, una descripción del verbo y <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> is empty or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> está vacío o es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" />en Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: O bien

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeHandler" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeHandler" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" />).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> que debe asociarse a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> in which this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> belongs.
trans-unit.target: La enumeración <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> a la que pertenece esta clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The description of the verb to show on the menu.
trans-unit.target: La descripción del verbo para mostrar en el menú.

trans-unit.source: The event handler that handles the menu selection event.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de eventos que controla el evento de selección del menú.

trans-unit.source: The event handler that handles status updates.
trans-unit.target: El controlador de eventos que controla las actualizaciones de estado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> by using an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> value, a description of the verb, and two <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" /> objects, one to handle menu selection events and the other to handle status updates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" /> utilizando <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />, un valor <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" />, una descripción del verbo, y dos objetos <see cref="T:System.EventHandler" />, uno para controlar los eventos de selección de menú y el otro para controlar las actualizaciones del estado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> nueva para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb.CommandID" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un nuevo objeto <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb.CommandID" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> is useful for placing items on a menu bar or context menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> es útil para colocar los elementos en una barra de menús o menú contextual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> asociada a la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> to associate verbs together on a menu bar or context menu.
trans-unit.target: Utilice <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbGroup> para asociar juntos los verbos en una barra de menús o menú contextual.

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer that describes the status of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un entero que describe el estado de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="int" /> that describes the <see langword="OleStatus" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="int" /> que describe <see langword="OleStatus" /> de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb" />.

trans-unit.source: The `OleStatus` contains a mixture of flags that reflect the state of this menu item.
trans-unit.target: `OleStatus` contiene una mezcla de marcas que reflejan el estado de este elemento de menú.
